metadata.title: CVE-2023-52697 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ASoC:Intel: sof_sdw_rt_sdca_jack_common: ctx->headset_codec_dev = NULLsof_sdw_rt_sdca_jack_exit() are used by different codecs, and some of themuse the same dai name. For example, rt712 and rt713 both use"rt712-sdca-aif1" and sof_sdw_rt_sdca_jack_exit(). As a result,sof_sdw_rt_sdca_jack_exit() will be called twice by mc_dailink_exit_loop().Set ctx->headset_codec_dev = NULL; afterput_device(ctx->headset_codec_dev); to avoid ctx->headset_codec_dev beingput twice.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52697` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-41-generic - 6.5.0-41.41
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-41-generic - 6.5.0-41.41
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-41-generic-64k - 6.5.0-41.41
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1022-azure - 6.5.0-1022.23
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1022-gcp - 6.5.0-1022.24
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-41-lowlatency - 6.5.0-41.41.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-41-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-41.41.1
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1018-raspi - 6.5.0-1018.21
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1015-starfive - 6.5.0-1015.16
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-41.41').
linux-aws package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1022.23').
linux-gcp package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1022.24').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support').
linux-laptop package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lowlatency package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-41.41.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-raspi package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1018.21').
linux-starfive package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1015.16').
